trans-unit.source: A factory that produces channels (<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannel"></xref> objects) used to communicate to a WS-Trust endpoint.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory"></xref> class with the specified binding.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> specified for the channels produced by the factory.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory"></xref> class with a specified endpoint.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> for the channels produced by the factory.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory"></xref> class with a specified endpoint configuration name.
The configuration name used for the endpoint.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory"></xref> class with a specified binding and endpoint address.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> specified for the channels produced by the factory.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref> that provides the location of the service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory"></xref> class with a specified binding and remote address.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> specified for the channels produced by the factory
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref> that provides the location of the service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory"></xref> class associated with a specified endpoint configuration name and endpoint address.
The configuration name used for the endpoint.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref> that provides the location of the service.
Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannel"></xref> object that is used to send messages to a service at a specific endpoint address through a specified transport address.
The object returned is an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannel> class.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref> that provides the location of the service.
The <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that contains the transport address to which the channel sends messages.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannel.Contract"></xref> object that represents the new channel.
Creates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> object used by channels created by the factory.

If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory.SecurityTokenResolver%2A> property is set to `null`, the ClientCertificate set on the factory Endpoint's ClientCredentials behavior will be used to create a resolver.
If no such certificate is found, an empty resolver is used.
If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory.UseKeyTokenResolver%2A> is set to `null`, an empty resolver will be used.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> initialized with the properties of the trust client.
Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannel"></xref> object using parameters that reflect the configuration of this factory.
The channel created by the base class capable of sending and receiving messages.
The version of WS-Trust that should be used.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> object that should be used to serialize WS-Trust messages.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustRequestSerializer"></xref> object that should be used to serialize WS-Trust request messages.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustResponseSerializer"></xref> object that should be used to serialize WS-Trust response messages.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannel"></xref> that represents the new channel.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> that contains the set of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects used by channels created by this factory for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
You cannot change the value of this property after a channel has been created.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> used to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.
If this property is not set, channels created by this factory will use the ClientCertificate set on the factory Endpoint's ClientCredentials behavior to create a resolver.
If no such certificate is found, an empty resolver is used.
You cannot change the value of this property after a channel has been created.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the version of WS-Trust that channels created by this factory use for serializing messages.

If this property is not set, channels created by this factory will use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory.TrustVersion%2A> set on any <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> found on the channel factory's Endpoint object if one exists.
You cannot change the value of this property after a channel has been created.
The version of WS-Trust that channels created by this factory use for serializing messages.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> used to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
If this property is not set an empty resolver is used.
You cannot change the value of this property after a channel has been created.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustRequestSerializer"></xref> used for serializing wst:RequestSecurityToken messages.

If this property is not set, either a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrust13RequestSerializer> object or a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005RequestSerializer> object will be used.
The serializer that is used will correspond to the version of WS-Trust indicated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory.TrustVersion%2A> property.
You cannot change the value of this property after a channel has been created.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustRequestSerializer"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustResponseSerializer"></xref> used for serializing wst:RequestSecurityTokensResponse messages.

If this property is not set, either a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrust13ResponseSerializer> object or a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005ResponseSerializer> object will be used.
The serializer that is used will correspond to the version of WS-Trust indicated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory.TrustVersion%2A> property.
You cannot change the value of this property after a channel has been created.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustResponseSerializer"></xref> object.
